headline.seo: Produce by ‘Prescription’ Seeks to Address Childhood Obesity

docs.lead_paragraph: Some doctors in Massachusetts are handing out coupons for use at farmers’ markets in an effort to promote healthy eating and combat childhood obesity.
docs.snippet: Some doctors in Massachusetts are handing out coupons for use at farmers’ markets in an effort to promote healthy eating and combat childhood obesity.

docs.abstract: A huge trial testing a weight-loss drug was cut short because of a risk of suicide, but also did not show reductions in cardiovascular health.
docs.lead_paragraph: One of the great hopes for weight-loss drugs is that they will be more than just cosmetic, that they will also reduce the risk of serious health conditions associated with obesity, like diabetes and heart disease.
docs.snippet: A huge trial testing a weight-loss drug was cut short because of a risk of suicide, but also did not show reductions in cardiovascular health.

headline.print_headline: DIET: Low-Fat vs. Atkins: Parallel Results
headline.main: Diet: Low-Fat vs. Atkins: Parallel Results

docs.lead_paragraph: One of the longest trials to pit low-fat diets against Atkins-style diets found that participants lost the same amount of weight after two years, regardless of which diet they were on.
docs.snippet: One of the longest trials to pit low-fat diets against Atkins-style diets found that participants lost the same amount of weight after two years, regardless of which diet they were on.

headline.main: The Early Word: Trailblazer to Fund-raiser

docs.abstract: The president travels to Texas to push his education plan and to raise funds for Democratic senate candidates.
docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama travels to Texas for two Democratic fund-raisers this afternoon. But in a symbol of how the president's role within the party has changed, Gov. Rick Perry, a Republican, will greet Mr. Obama while the Democratic gubernatorial candidate, Bill White, sticks to the trail.
docs.snippet: The president travels to Texas to push his education plan and to raise funds for Democratic senate candidates.
